pages.title: About me
pages.text: 关于 Aim 做这个Blog的目的没有，就想写一点小小的东西,技术也好，生活也好，都是我所想，不足之处多多海涵，谢谢！ My 只想安安静静把它做好！ Future Nothing is impossible! Hobby Computer && Cartoon; love Yang XY; Contact me QQ:75497438E-mail:limitedin@163.com

posts.title: 《程序设计C》-实验2
posts.text:
《程序设计C》-实验2答案(仅供参考)-->Write By : DengKang > 点我去学校ACM第一题:计算员工周工资123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930#include<stdio.h>int main(void){ int time; float salary; scanf("%d %f",&time,&salary); if(time<0||time>(24*7)) printf("input is wrong!
"); else if(time>40) { salary=(time-40)*(1.5*salary)+salary*40; printf("%g
",salary); } else if(time>60) { salary=(time-60)*(3*salary)+20*(1.5*salary)*salary*40; printf("%g
",salary); } else { salary=salary*time; printf("%g
",salary); } return 0;} 第二题:计算生日是星期几12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758#include<stdio.h>int main(void){ int year,month,day; int sum,leap,count=0; int all; scanf("%d %d %d",&year,&month,&day); for(int i=1;i<year;i++) //判断到本年的前一年有多少天 { if(( i%4==0 && i%100!=0 )||(i%400==0)) count++; } all=366*count+365*(year-count-1); //到今年的前一年的天数 switch(month) //先计算某月以前月份的总天数 { case 1:sum = 0;break; case 2:sum = 31;break; case 3:sum = 59;break; case 4: sum = 90;break; case 5:sum = 120;break; case 6:sum = 151;break; case 7:sum = 181;break; case 8:sum = 212;break; case 9:sum = 243;break; case 10:sum = 273;break; case 11:sum = 304;break; case 12:sum = 334;break; default:printf("data error!
");break; } sum = sum + day; //再加上某天的天数 if(year%400==0||(year%4==0&&year%100!=0)) //判断是不闰年 { leap = 1; }else{ leap = 0; } if(leap == 1&&month > 2) //如果是闰年且月份大于2，那么天数加1 { sum++; } int w=(all+sum)%7; switch (w) { case 0: printf("Sunday
");break; case 1: printf("Monday
");break; case 2: printf("Tuesday
");break; case 3: printf("Wednesday
");break; case 4: printf("Thursday
");break; case 5: printf("Friday
");break; case 6: printf("Saturday
");break; } return 0;} 第三题:计算n！123456789101112131415#include<stdio.h>int main(void){int a=1,b,i;scanf("%d",&b);if(b<0||b>20)printf("shuruwuxiao!
");else{for(i=1;i<=b;i++)a=a*i;printf("%d
",a);}return 0;} 第四题:简单的计算器12345678910111213141516#include<stdio.h>int main(void){ int a, b,sum; char c; scanf("%d%c%d", &a, &c, &b); switch (c) { case '+':sum = a+b; printf("%d+%d=%d
",a,b,sum); break; case '-':sum = a-b; printf("%d-%d=%d
",a,b,sum); break; case '*':sum = a*b; printf("%d*%d=%d
",a,b,sum); break; case '/':sum = a/b; printf("%d/%d=%d
",a,b,sum); break; } return 0;} 感谢您的浏览，因能力有限，发现错误之处请向我联系（我会尽快改正）！

posts.title: 《程序设计C》-实验1
posts.text:
《程序设计C》-实验1答案(仅供参考)-->Write By : DengKang > 点我去学校ACM第一题:最简单的C程序1234567#include<stdio.h>int main(void){ printf("Welcome to the OnlineJudge of Southwest University of Science and Technology!
"); //注意 
 不能少 return 0; } 第二题：数字转换成字符12345678910111213#include<stdio.h>int main(void){ int a,b; scanf("%d %d",&a,&b); printf("%d %d
",sizeof(int),sizeof(char)); printf("%c %c
",a,b); return 0; } 第三题:求圆柱体的体积1234567891011121314151617#include<stdio.h>#define PI 3.14159 //定义PI为常量int main(void){ float r,h,v; v=PI*r*r*h; scanf("%f %f",&r,&h); printf("radius:%.3f
",r); printf("high:%.3f
",h); printf("The volume is:%.3f
",v); return 0;} 感谢您的浏览，因能力有限，发现错误之处请向我联系（我会尽快改正）！###9.20 修正了一个小错误

posts.title: My first blog
posts.text: 感谢弄了这么久，各种问题，总算是好了！
